motions.title: Resolution Establishing the 2022 Millage Rate
motions.description: Adoption of resolution establishing the 2022 millage rate at 3.040 mills after third public hearing.

publicHearings.title: Public Hearing for Establishing 2022 Millage Rate
publicHearings.description: Third and final public hearing for proposed 2022 millage rate of 3.040 mills. Proposed increase from 2.74 mills to 3.040 mills impacts typical Dunwoody homes between $33-$69 per year. Main goal is to have ongoing revenue and expenses move closer together.

discussionItems.title: Project Agreement with Georgia Department of Transportation for North Shallowford Road Path Project
discussionItems.description: City awarded $560,000 by Atlanta Regional Commission for design of North Shallowford Road path project. Federal funds administered by GDOT requiring project agreement approval.

discussionItems.title: Contract with TSW for Final Design of Gateway Signage
discussionItems.description: Contract with TSW for final design of gateway signage. Council asked to include gateway sign on hill by furniture store off Ashford Dunwoody Road and Happy Hollow at Dunwoody Club Drive.

discussionItems.title: Capital Project List Discussion
discussionItems.description: Discussion of Capital Project list. If bond referendum question on ballot this year, Council needed to decide by July 25. Staff directed to have Capital Working Committee refine list to land acquisition and park development only.

discussionItems.title: Authorize Purchase of Replacement Firearms for Police Department
discussionItems.description: Request for authorization to purchase replacement firearms for police department. Deputy Chief to confirm if weapons purchased under state contract.

discussionItems.title: Authorize Specialized Unit Pay for Police Department
discussionItems.description: Request for authorization for specialized unit pay for fifteen officers in amount of additional $4,000 per year per officer. Council requested staff review for equity and comparison to surrounding departments.

discussionItems.title: Consent Agenda Approval
discussionItems.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • June 8, 2022, City Council special called meeting minutes • June 13, 2022, City Council special called meeting minutes • June 13, 2022, City Council meeting minutes • June 17, 2022, City Council special called meeting minutes • Lease agreement with Georgia Power for streetlights on Chamblee Dunwoody Road • Request for approval of on-call stormwater engineering and design contract

discussionItems.title: Right of Way Agreement with Brookfield Properties for Ashford Dunwoody Commuter Trail Phase I
discussionItems.description: Approval of right of way agreement with Brookfield Properties for Ashford Dunwoody Commuter Trail Phase I project. Brookfield providing right of way and easements appraised at $4.2M in exchange for consideration of costs including sign relocation, up to $40,000 for lender releases, and up to $5,000 for closing costs. City's cost approximately $110,000 with PCID paying 75%.

discussionItems.title: Amendment of City Position Allocation and Compensation Chart
discussionItems.description: Approval of amendment to city position allocation and compensation chart, effective June 30, 2022. Fourth increase since March 2021. Budget Committee also recommended increasing housing stipend from $700 to $800.

discussionItems.title: Agreement Concerning Funding for Arts and Nature Center
discussionItems.description: Approval of agreement for funding for Arts and Nature Center. Dunwoody Facilities Authority will hold special called meeting to approve agreement and changes to Spruill Arts Center agreement.

discussionItems.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
discussionItems.description: Motion to enter executive session for the purpose of legal, real estate, and personnel discussion.
